benchmark_details.name: MovieStory101
benchmark_details.overview: MovieStory101 is a new dataset focused on generating dense descriptions for three-minute movie clips, annotated with detailed storyline descriptions, subtitles, and character identity labels for dialogue lines.
benchmark_details.data_type: video clips with storyline descriptions and annotations

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive dataset for evaluating long video descriptions through dense annotations and automated question answering.

data.source: Derived from movies in Movie101 and Movie101v2, with curated three-minute clips annotated for storyline and character identification.
data.annotation: Manual annotation by data experts, including storyline descriptions and character identity labels.

methodology.calculation: QA accuracy based on responses generated relative to automated questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance in generating coherent and detailed video descriptions.
methodology.baseline_results: Outperformed Gemini-1.5-pro with 9.5% higher accuracy on StoryQA.
methodology.validation: Evaluated via StoryQA, focusing on multiple-choice questions related to video content.
